entry.title: Chips Ahoy! Hershey's Fudge Filled Cookies
entry.summary:
Vendor: Nabisco
Type: Snacks
Price: 9.99

Soft, Chewy, and Filled with Fudge!

     Nothing hits the spot better than a soft, well-baked chocolate chip cookie, but we think there's something that can top even that. These delicious cookies are stuffed to the edges with smooth Hershey's Chocolate Fudge; an indulgent treat you don't want to miss out on!

     Each bite is a blend of buttery cookie and tons of rich chocolate that will swirl around your tastebuds, giving you the perfect cookie experience that you've been searching for. Chips Ahoy! Hershey's Fudge Filled Cookies are only available for a limited time, so hurry and grab some while they're still hot!

     Don't just stop at munching them right out of the box! These cookies are the perfect addition in an over-the-top sundae dessert, or even just heated up and letting the warm chocolate ooze onto your tongue. However you decide to enjoy them, these are certainly an unforgettable treat!

9.6oz / 272g | 1 pack

entry.title: Oreo Salted Caramel Brownie - 12oz
entry.summary:
Vendor: Nabisco
Type: Snacks
Price: 11.99

LIMITED EDITION

Gourmet Oreos

Salted Caramel Brownie Style

2021's Must-Try Snacks

Oreo has blow us away with their new rich twist on the original Oreo. These new cookies quite literally encompass everything a salted caramel brownie would have!  At Candy Funhouse we are calling these "Gourmet Oreos" because we are in Oreo heaven after trying these! Why you may ask? Let us tell you...

Say goodbye to one layer of creme and now enjoy 2 layers of creme; a luscious sweet caramel flavour and a rich chocolatey brownie flavour! The iconic chocolate wafers have remained the same, BUT are now topped with a perfect sprinkle of salt that elevates the creme fillings. 

Indulge in a cookie like no other, as you add vanilla ice cream to this perfectly formulated Salted Caramel Brownie Oreo ✨chefs kiss✨

12oz (345g)

Available exclusively at Candy Funhouse

entry.title: Galaxy Chocolate Chip Cookie Mix - 180g
entry.summary:
Vendor: Mars
Type: Snacks
Price: 8.49

Time To DIY With This Fabulously Delicious Cookie Mix!

  Sometimes store-bought cookies just ain't it, we know you're looking to treat your tastebuds with nothing but the best. Thankfully Galaxy has come to the rescue with the perfect dessert and activity mixed into one! 

  All you need to make this pouch turn into 8 soft, chewy cookies is 25g of butter, 15ml of water, and 20 minutes of your time. Baking has never been easier - or quite this mouthwatering! The batter mix contains many chunks of rich, silky smooth Galaxy Milk Chocolate that will melt over your tongue with each bite you take. 

  Don't hesitate! Make your next sleepover, stay-at-home date, or get-together with friends a hit bit this fun and succulent way to make some memories.

Think chocolate. Think Galaxy.


(1 packet) 180g

 

 

Directions (as listed on the packaging):

  • Preheat your oven to 180°C/ Fan 160°C/ Gas Mark 4
  • Empty the contents of the pouch into a bowl
  • Soften 25g of butter in the microwave. (Make sure it isn't too hot or it will melt the chocolate)
  • Add the softened butter to the cookie mix and stir well. (It should look a bit like a crumble mix)
  • Add water and mix if you have stiff dough. (Add extra water if necessary)
  • Divide the mix into 8 evenly sized balls. Place on an ungreased baking tray and flatten. (Leave enough room between cookies so they can spread)
  • Bake in the centre of the oven for 12 minutes until golden (or leave in a little longer for extra crunch)
  • Allow the cookies to cool on the baking tray before transferring to a wire rack to cool completely

entry.title: Dare Ultimate Maple Creme Cookie - 290g
entry.summary:
Vendor: Dare
Type: Snacks
Price: 3.96

Made Better by Dare

    To celebrate Dare's 125th birthday, they searched for a 125-year-old maple tree deep in the forests of Quebec. Once they found the perfect tree, its sap was carefully pulled to make a special batch of maple syrup just for Canada's favourite cookie; Dare's Ultimate Maple Creme! 

    The richest maple syrup became the most delicious cookies, creamy filling with nothing but the most authentic maple syrup flavour between two buttery biscuits. These are delightful sweet treats that are perfect for sharing with everyone in the family!

    Dare has been committed to providing the highest quality products since their first hand-made cookie was baked back in 1892. They stand by their promise of Made Better, especially when it comes to baking delicious snacks for your family. Being a privately-owned Canadian family business with over 125 years of snack-making experience under their belt, you can be sure that what you're tasting is nothing but the best! Constantly pushing for new ways to innovate their products and leave out the ingredients you wouldn't want in your kitchen, you can feel good about eating their proudly Canadian snacks.

  • No Artificial Colours or Flavours
  • No Preservatives
  • Flavoured with Real Maple Syrup
  • Peanut-Free
  • Kosher Dairy OU-D

290 g

entry.title: Glico Pocky Cream Coated Biscuit Sticks - Chocolate - 1.41oz
entry.summary:
Vendor: Gilco
Type: Snacks
Price: 1.49

A Unique and Delicious Japanese Treat

Glico Pocky Chocolate Cream Coated Biscuit Sticks is a unique Japanese treat. They are a biscuit like confection that is coated in a yummy strawberry cream. The name "Pocky" is derived from the sound that this crispy snack makes when eaten. 

1.41oz/40g

Ingredients:

Wheat Flour, sugar, vegetable oil (sunflower oil, palm oil), lactose, whole milk powder, palm oil shortening, colour, artificial flavours, salt, yeast, strawberry powder, soy lecithin, baking powder, monoglycerides, sodium hydroxide, vitamins and mineral, papain

• Simulated flavours
• Contains: wheat, milk, soy
• Manufactured in a facility that uses: barley, rye, oats, almonds
